title: Increase Sales Productivity Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1Your manager is excited about the potential of an AI sales solution. However, she's concerned that sales reps will fear for their jobs. What do you tell her?

answers.content: A AI for sales actually frees up sales reps to focus on developing customer relationships.
B AI for sales isn't quite ready yet, so it's premature to worry.
C AI for sales gives sales reps key insights, but they still have to manually log all their emails and events.
D The sales reps have nothing to be concerned about, because robots need operators.

correctAnswer.content: A AI for sales actually frees up sales reps to focus on developing customer relationships.

questions.title: 2What are the basic components of any AI sales solution, whether your company builds one from scratch or uses Sales Cloud Einstein?

answers.content: B Big data, sales process use cases, algorithms, and an app
D A team of data scientists and a small budget for development

wrongAnswers.content: A A team of scientists to continually analyze data that your team produces
C An expensive deep learning computer that's hooked up to all your data

correctAnswer.content: B Big data, sales process use cases, algorithms, and an app

questions.title: 3How are AI sales solutions like Sales Cloud Einstein so affordable?

answers.content: A Sales Cloud Einstein uses big data, cheaper processors, and better algorithms.
B Sales Cloud Einstein requires the customer to write some of the algorithms.
C Sales Cloud Einstein requires the customer to follow specific data entry procedures.
D Sales Cloud Einstein requires customers to have a team of data scientists on staff.

correctAnswer.content: A Sales Cloud Einstein uses big data, cheaper processors, and better algorithms.
